rooms.name: IlliniUnionBookstore
rooms.description: You are in the Illini Union Bookstore. There are a lot of poor college students trying to buy expensive textbooks

rooms.name: HenryAdministrationBuilding
rooms.description: You are in the Henry Administration Building. You see calculus students solving complex trig integrals in their discussion sections

rooms.name: IlliniUnion
rooms.description: You are in the Illini Union. The smell of coffee drifts toward you from Starbucks

rooms.name: Altgeld
rooms.description: You are in Altgeld. You can see the post office.

rooms.name: NoyesLaboratory
rooms.description: You are in NoyesLaboratory. A mob of students exit Noyes 100 as their lecture ends

rooms.name: DavenportHall
rooms.description: You are in Davenport Hall. You admire the wooden, rustic interior of the building

rooms.name: EnglishBuilding
rooms.description: You are in the English Building. You see English majors sitting downstairs, proofreading their essays

rooms.name: ForeignLanguagesBuilding
rooms.description: You are in Foreign Languages Building. You hear students speaking languages from regions all across the globe

rooms.name: Foellinger
rooms.description: You are in Foellinger. You are amazed by the size and elegance of Foellinger's auditorium
